specContentBase64.title: Bse64编码的API定义，支持OAS2.0和OAS3.0规范，支持YAML格式和JSON格式。
specContentBase64.description: Base64 encoded API definition, supporting OAS2.0 and OAS3.0 specifications, in YAML or JSON format. It has a higher priority than the `specFileUrl` parameter. If the file size exceeds 10MB, please use the `specFileUrl` parameter to transfer.

specFileUrl.title: OAS文件的下载地址，需要支持免验证下载。优先级低于specContentBase64字段。
specFileUrl.description: Download URL for the API definition file, which must be accessible from the public network or via an internal OSS download address within the same region. The file URL must have download permissions. For non-publicly readable OSS file links, refer to the documentation at https://help.aliyun.com/zh/oss/user-guide/how-to-obtain-the-url-of-a-single-object-or-the-urls-of-multiple-objects, and provide a URL with download permissions. Currently, only API definition files stored on OSS are supported.

name.title: API名称。
name.description: The name of the imported API. If not provided, it will be extracted from the API definition file. If the API name and version configuration already exist, this import will update the existing API definition based on the `strategy` field.

description.title: API描述。
description.description: The description of the imported API. If not provided, it will be extracted from the API definition. The length is limited to 255 bytes.

versionConfig.description: API versioning configuration. If versioning is enabled, and the version number and API name match an existing API, this import will be treated as an update. If versioning is not enabled, and the API name matches an existing API, this import will also be treated as an update.

dryRun.title: 预检功能，不进行导入只检查Swagger定义。
dryRun.description: Pre-import check. If enabled, only the check will be performed without importing the API.

strategy.title: 导入时的冲突合并策略，为空默ExistFirst
strategy.description:
When the imported API name and version management match an existing API, you need to specify an update strategy.
- SpecOnly: Completely based on the imported file.
- SpecFirst: Prioritize the imported file, add new interfaces and update existing ones, while keeping interfaces not mentioned in the file unchanged.
- ExistFirst: Prioritize the existing API, only add new interfaces without updating existing ones.
If not specified, the default strategy is ExistFirst.

targetHttpApiId.title: 导入覆盖指定的HTTP API。若指定该字段，则name和versionConfig字段失效。
targetHttpApiId.description: If this field is specified, this import will update the specified API instead of importing or searching for an existing API based on the API name and version management configuration. The target API must be of REST type.

resourceGroupId.description: The ID of the resource group.

bucketName.description: The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket that stores the dictionary file.

action.description:
Action to be executed after the precheck.
- Create: Create
- Update: Update

failureOperations.description: List of APIs that failed the precheck.

successComponents.description: List of data structures that passed the precheck.

action.description:

failureComponents.description: List of data structures that failed the precheck.

errorMessages.description: Error messages. If there are any error messages, the API cannot be imported successfully.

warningMessages.description: Warning messages. If there are any warning messages, some interfaces or data interfaces may not be imported successfully.

existHttpApiInfo.description: 已存在的API信息。若该字段非空，则导入动作将更新该API。
